data.text: @simongerman600 The root cause is the HK regulation forced all Covid patients must stay in the public hospital which overloaded it and infect most of other patients. This killed most of the elder people and many other patients.

@simongerman600 There are other more troubling problems than the superficial lack of vaccination in the elderly. But as the narrative is fixed like in everywhere, I don't expect much from health "experts", who might be trusted by a few cosmopolitans in HK.
@simongerman600 Now do a simple correlation between new cases and new deaths.
@simongerman600 Nobody wants to know about COVID anymore. Now, is just part of life.
